attributes.action: Replace Car Tax and add extra tax on fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scrap the current Car Tax and add the amount which would have been raised onto the existing fuel tax charged per litre. Thus, those motorists using the roads more and those with less economical vehicles will be pay proportionately more tax. Additionally, nobody will be able to evade paying the fuel tax like they can at the moment with Car Tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
